ovdesc.p: This table can be used to schedule XML reports as specified in AM.REP.TEMPLATE.
Records in this table are automatically generated on validation of SEC.ACC.MASTER records if a record exists in AM.REP.PARAMETER and specifies the MANAGED.ACCOUNT level(s) to report on.
AM.REP.PARAMETER can be used to default in template, frequency and offset working days to the records created in this table.

desc.p: Should be a valid T24 frequency code and optionally start date. This determines the statement date.
The reporting template to be used to generate this report.
Must be a valid record in AM.REP.TEMPLATE.
Record id for AM.REPORT - takes the format SEC.ACC.MASTER_id*P, e.g. "50030-1*P"
Offset Working Days from Statement Date.
This is the number of working days that this report will be produced after the portfolio statement date as defined in the field STMT.FREQUENCY
